description.value:
Level 1 Enchantment

Casting Time: 1 action

Range: 60 feet

Components: V

Duration: Instantaneous

You speak a one-word command to a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or follow the command on its next turn. Choose the command from these options: • The target moves toward you by the shortest and most direct route, ending its turn if it moves within 5 feet of you. • The target drops whatever it is holding and then ends its turn. • The target spends its turn moving away from you by the fastest available means. • The target has the Prone|XPHB condition and then ends its turn. • On its turn, the target doesn't move and takes no action or Bonus Action|XPHB.

At Higher Levels: You can affect one additional creature for each spell slot level above 1.
